tool_description: Performs comprehensive DNS health checks including record validation, nameserver connectivity, security configurations, and performance analysis.

domain_name.description: Domain name to perform DNS health validation on

check_types.description: Types of checks to perform: connectivity, records, security, performance, all

timeout_seconds.description: Timeout for DNS queries in seconds (5-60)

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain name must be a valid fully qualified domain name.
Invalid check types: Check types must be one or more of: connectivity, records, security, performance, all.
Timeout out of range: Timeout must be between 5 and 60 seconds.
Domain not found: The specified domain does not exist or has no DNS records.
DNS query timeout: One or more DNS queries timed out during validation.
usage: Provide domain name to validate. Optionally specify which types of health checks to perform and set query timeout. The tool performs comprehensive DNS analysis and reports issues with recommendations.

record_validation.description: DNS record validation results and issues found
